resources.string: Enable accessibility controls for the video player?
Your controls are modified because an accessibility service is on.

"GmsCore does not have the permission to run in background.
Follow the 'Don't kill my app!' guide for your device, and apply the instructions to your GmsCore installation.
This is required for the app to work."

"GmsCore battery optimizations must be disabled to prevent issues.
Disabling battery optimizations for GmsCore will not negatively affect battery usage.
Tap the continue button and allow optimization changes."
If you recently changed your account login details, then uninstall and reinstall GmsCore.
To receive notifications in RVX, enable Cloud Messaging.
GmsCore is not installed. Install it.
Advanced video quality menu is not shown.
Advanced video quality menu is shown.
Old style flyout menu is used.
Advanced video quality menu type in Shorts

"DeArrow provides crowdsourced thumbnails for YouTube videos. These thumbnails are often more relevant than those provided by YouTube.
If enabled, video URLs will be sent to the API server and no other data is sent. If a video does not have DeArrow thumbnails, then the original or still captures are shown.
Tap here to learn more about DeArrow."
The URL of the DeArrow thumbnail cache endpoint.
Toast is not shown if DeArrow is unavailable.
Toast is shown if DeArrow is unavailable.
Show a toast if API is unavailable
Still captures are taken from the beginning, middle, or end of each video. These images are built into YouTube and no external API is used.
Using medium quality still captures. Thumbnails will load faster, but live streams, unreleased, or very old videos may show blank thumbnails.
Video time to take still captures from
Information is not appended to the timestamp.

"Information is appended to the timestamp.
Tap to configure the video quality or playback speed. Tap and hold to toggle the appended information type."
Old style flyout menu is used.
Ambient mode is disabled in battery saver mode.
Ambient mode is enabled in battery saver mode.
The domain to fetch images from.\nNote: Only enter the domain name, i.e., without the \"https\:\/\/\" prefix.
Using original image host.\n\nEnabling this can fix missing images that are blocked in some regions.

"Changes include:
Tablet layout • Community posts are hidden.
Automotive layout • Shorts open in regular player. • Feed is organized by topics and channels. • Video description cannot be opened when 'Spoof streaming data' is turned off."
Live stream opens when the live ring is clicked.

"Channel opens when the live ring is clicked.
Limitation: When the Shorts live stream is opened in regular player due to the 'Open Shorts in regular player' setting, channel does not open."
Background color of the server-side snackbar has not changed.
Background color of the server-side snackbar has changed.

"Some snack bars use a theme defined on the server side, not the app theme.
Change the background color of these snack bars.
If there are server-side changes, the background color of the snack bar may not change."

"Start page always changes.
Limitation: Back button on the toolbar may not work."
Are you sure you want to proceed?
List of component path builder strings to filter, separated by new lines.
Custom speeds must be less than %sx.
Add or change available playback speeds.
Player overlay opacity must be between 0-100.
Opacity value between 0-100, where 0 is transparent.
Type the hex code of the seekbar accent color.
Type the hex code of the seekbar primary color.
Copies RVX debug logs to the clipboard.
Export RVX debug logs to a file.
Clears all stored RVX debug logs.
Logs are too large to copy.
Debug logs do not include proto buffer.
Debug logs do not include spannable.
Toast is not shown if error occurs.
Toast is shown if error occurs.
To open YouTube links in RVX, enable Open supported links and enable all the Supported web addresses.
Default Shorts quality on mobile network
Default video quality on mobile network
Default Shorts quality on Wi-Fi network
Default video quality on Wi-Fi network
Disables ambient mode for fullscreen only.
Ambient mode is enabled in fullscreen.
Ambient mode is disabled in fullscreen.
To use this feature, change \'Default client (Spoof streaming data)\' to TV, TV Simply or iOS TV.
Forced auto audio tracks are enabled.
Forced auto audio tracks are disabled.

"Forced auto audio tracks are disabled.
This may not work for some users, if it doesn't work for you: 1. Go to Settings - RVX - Miscellaneous - Spoof streaming data, and turn on 'Use JavaScript client'. 2. Go to Settings - RVX - Miscellaneous - Spoof streaming data, and change 'Default client' to 'TV'."
Auto player popup panels are enabled.
Auto player popup panels are disabled.

"Auto switch mix playlists is enabled when autoplay is turned on.
Autoplay can be changed in YouTube settings: Settings → Autoplay / Playback → Autoplay next video"
Auto switch mix playlists is disabled.
Enabling this feature will disable automatic switching to YouTube Mix when playing music while autoplay is turned on.
Double tap can occasionally trigger a skip to the next / previous chapter.
Double tap can never trigger a skip to the next / previous chapter.
Default playback speed is enabled for music.
Default playback speed is disabled for music.
Default playback speed is disabled for videos playable on YouTube Music.
Default playback speed is disabled if the video category is Music.
DRC (Dynamic Range Compression) audio is enabled.
DRC (Dynamic Range Compression) audio is disabled.
Video orientation follows device settings in fullscreen.
Video orientation is portrait mode in fullscreen.
Layout will be updated by the server.
Layout will not be updated by the server.

"App layout reverts to the layout it was using when it was first installed.
Some server-side layouts may not revert.
Changes include: • Components in player flyout menu (or related settings) may not work. • Rolling numbers are not animated. • The Library tab is used. • The Music section of video description may not work. • Account switch button may not appear on the Library tab. Use the 'Enable wide search bar in You tab' setting."
Like and Dislike buttons will glow when mentioned.
Like and Dislike buttons will not glow when mentioned.
Disable Like and Dislike buttons glow

Continue watching will resume on app startup.

Info:
• Continue watching is the YouTube Premium feature.
• This setting does not force Continue watching to be enabled.
Continue watching will not resume on app startup.
Shorts player will resume on app startup.
Shorts player will not resume on app startup.

"Shorts background play is enabled.
Info: Shorts background playback is only available through Picture-in-picture mode."
Like button fountain animation is enabled.
Like button fountain animation is disabled.
Sign in to TV popup is enabled.
Sign in to TV popup is disabled.
Disable Sign in to TV popup

"Disable '2x>>' while holding down.
Note: • Disabling the speed overlay restores the Slide to seek behavior of the old layout. • Disabling this setting does not forcefully enable the speed overlay."
Swiping down below the player will enter fullscreen mode.
Swiping down below the player will not enter fullscreen mode.
Disable swipe to enter fullscreen mode (below the player)
Swiping up in player will enter fullscreen mode.
Swiping up in player will not enter fullscreen mode.
Disable swipe to enter fullscreen mode (in player)
Swiping down in fullscreen will exit fullscreen mode.
Swiping down in fullscreen will not exit fullscreen mode.
Disable swipe to exit fullscreen mode
Status bar is opaque or translucent.
For some manufacturer ROMs running Android 12+, enabling this feature may make the system navigation bar transparent.

"Disables the following interactions when the video description is expanded:
• Tap to scroll. • Tap and hold to select text."

"VP9 codec is disabled.
Info: • Maximum resolution is 1080p. • Video playback will use more internet data than VP9. • VP9 codec is still used for HDR video."
Video id is unavailable. Please manually reopen the video.

"Gradient seekbar is enabled.
Side effect: Cairo theme is also applied to notification dots."
"Clicking on the comment panel title ('Comments') does nothing."

"Clicking on the comment panel title ('Comments') scrolls to the top.
Limitations: • Does not apply to comment replies. • In 'Timed', clicking the comment panel title ('Comments') scrolls to the bottom."
Enable scroll to top in comments
Controls overlay does not fill the fullscreen.
Spacing between navigation buttons is normal.
Spacing between navigation buttons is narrow.
Enables the OPUS codec if the player response includes it.

"This will restore thumbnails to live streams that do not have seekbar thumbnails.
Internet data usage may be higher, and seekbar thumbnails will have a slight delay before showing.
This feature works best with a very fast internet connection."

"Clear mode is enabled.
Click on the player background to hide the UI."
Custom actions are disabled in flyout menu.

"Custom actions are enabled in flyout menu.
Limitations: • Does not work with live stream."
Enable custom actions in flyout menu
Custom actions are disabled in toolbar.

"Custom actions are enabled in toolbar.
Press and hold the More button to show the Custom actions dialog."

"Timestamp is enabled.
Limitations: • Enabling timestamp leaves empty space below action bar. • As this is a feature in development stage by Google, the layout may be broken."
Swiping up / down in fullscreen mode will not change to the next / previous video.
Swiping up / down in fullscreen mode will change to the next / previous video.
Watch next processing delay is disabled.
Watch next processing delay is enabled.

"This setting forces a delay before the player UI loads.
This can be used when testing something on the MainThread."

"Enabling this setting will disable the Settings button in the You tab.
In this case, please use the following path to access the settings: You tab → View channel → Menu → Settings"
Wide search bar is disabled in You tab.

"Wide search bar is enabled in You tab.
To access settings, please use the following path: You tab → View channel → Menu → Settings"
Enable wide search bar in You tab

"Enabling this setting will disable the Settings button in You tab.
In this case, you may need to use the following path to access the settings: You tab → View channel → Menu → Settings"
Wide search bar disables and uses YouTube header space.
Wide search bar is enabled along with YouTube header.
Enable wide search bar with header
Do not enter fullscreen mode when the video starts.

"Enter fullscreen mode when the video starts.
Limitation: Does not work if the player is minimized, in PiP mode, or in background."
Enter fullscreen mode when video starts
Exit fullscreen mode at end of video
"This setting is currently unavailable. To use this feature, change 'Default client (Spoof streaming data)' to TV or TV Simply."
Import settings from a saved file.
The package name cannot be empty
"%1$s is not installed. Please download %2$s from the website."
%s is not installed. Please install it.
Package name of your installed external downloader app.
Package name of your installed external downloader app, such as NewPipe or YTDLnis, on long press.
Long press video downloader package name
Package name of your installed external downloader app.

"Could not find installed app with package name: %s.
Verify the package name is correct and the app is installed."

"In YouTube 19.25.39 or earlier, the Hype icon is hidden in the video action bar and video description panel.
As a workaround, the app version is spoofed to 19.26.42 in the '/get_watch' endpoint and '/next' endpoint.
If you turn off this setting, the Hype icon may not show in the video action bar and video description panel.
※ Even if this setting is turned off, the Hype button may not be hidden."
"The 'Playback' setting is used instead of the 'Autoplay' setting.
"The 'Autoplay' setting is used instead of the 'Playback' setting."
Fix Spoof app version side effect

"If the app version has been spoofed to 19.30 or earlier even once, the 'Playback' setting may be broken.
This depends on what response the app receives from the server.
If the 'Playback' setting is broken, turning on this setting may resolve the issue.
If the 'Playback' setting is still broken even after enabling or disabling this setting, then you should clear the app data."
Gemini API Key not set in ReVanced Extended settings.
No raw transcription data to parse
Translating with Gemini...\n\n⚠️ This step may fail if Gemini ignores the instructions or hits the limit.
Enable \"Display over other apps\" to show as subtitles
The font size of the transcribed video subtitles. Tap the subtitle box to hide it, or long-press to drag it to a different position.
Displays the optimization dialog for GMSCore at each application startup.
Gradient start and end positions from 0 to 1 separated by comma.
List of account menu names to filter, separated by new lines.

Filter if matches.

To hide the \'Get YouTube Premium\' menu, you can only use \'Get YouTube Premium\' as keywords.

Filter if contains.

To hide the \'Get YouTube Premium\' menu, you can use \'YouTube Premium\' or \'Premium\' as keywords.
"Hide elements of the account menu and You tab. Some components may not be hidden."

"Action buttons are hidden by identifier filter.
Info: • Right action buttons are hidden. • Hiding action buttons leaves empty space."

"Action buttons are hidden by index.
Info: • Wrong action buttons may be hidden, or action buttons may not be hidden. • Hiding action buttons leaves no empty space."
AI-generated video summary section is shown.
AI-generated video summary section is hidden.
Featured places, Games, Music, and People mentioned sections are shown.
Featured places, Games, Music, and People mentioned sections are hidden.

Examples of carousel shelves:

Breaking news, Continue watching, Explore more channels, For You, Listen again, Most relevant, Shopping, Watch it again
Shown in Home feed and related videos.
Hidden in Home feed and related videos.
Hide in Home feed and related videos
"Hides the following shelves: • Breaking news • Continue watching • Explore more channels • Listen again • Shopping • Watch it again"
"Carousel shelves are hidden, such as: • Breaking news • Continue watching • Explore more channels • Listen again • Most relevant • Shopping • Watch it again"
List of channel tab names to filter, separated by new lines.

Emoji and timestamp buttons are hidden.

Comments by members banner is hidden.

Create a Short button is hidden.
Emoji and timestamp buttons are shown.
Emoji and timestamp buttons are hidden.

"Highlighted search links are hidden.
Limitation: Some highlighted search links that do not have a default text style may not be hidden."
Comments section is shown in Home feed.
Comments section is hidden in Home feed.
Hide Comments section in Home feed
Shown in Home feed and related videos.
Hidden in Home feed and related videos.

Creator store shelf under videos is hidden.

End screen store banner is hidden.
End screen suggested video is shown.

"End screen suggested video is hidden when autoplay is turned off.
Autoplay can be changed in YouTube settings: Settings → Autoplay / Playback → Autoplay next video"
Expandable card under videos is shown.
Expandable card under videos is hidden.
List of flyout menu names to filter, separated by new lines.

Filter if matches.

To hide the \'Play next in queue\' menu, you can only use \'Play next in queue\' as keywords.

Filter if contains.

To hide the \'Play next in queue\' menu, you can use \'Play next\' or \'in queue\' as keywords.
Feed flyout menu filter is disabled.
Feed flyout menu filter is enabled.

"Home / Subscriptions / Search results are filtered to hide content that matches keyword phrases.
Limitations: • Shorts cannot be hidden by channel name. • Some UI components may not be hidden. • Searching for a keyword may show no results."

Surrounding a keyword / phrase with double-quotes will prevent partial matches of video titles and channel names.

For example,
\"ai\" will hide the video: How does AI work?
but will not hide: What does fair use mean?
Videos in Home feed are not filtered.
Videos in Home feed are filtered.

"Keywords and phrases to hide, separated by new lines.
Keywords can be channel names or any text shown in video titles.
Words with uppercase letters in the middle must be entered with the casing (ie: iPhone, TikTok, LeBlanc)."
Videos in Subscriptions feed are not filtered.
Videos in Subscriptions feed are filtered.

\'AND\' operator (\'&\') is disabled.

When \"Blue\" & \"Red\" is used as a keyword, keywords containing \"Blue\" & \"Red\" will be filtered.

\'AND\' operator (\'&\') is enabled.

When \"Blue\" & \"Red\" is used as a keyword, keywords containing both Blue and Red will be filtered.
Keyword is too short and requires quotes: %s.
Like and Dislike buttons are shown.
Like and Dislike buttons are hidden.
Live chat messages are hidden.\n\nThis setting applies to Shorts live streams too.
Live chat replay button in video overlay is shown.
Live chat replay button in video overlay is hidden.
Player control buttons background is shown
Player control buttons background is hidden

"Audio track menu is hidden.
To show the Audio track menu: 1. Go to Settings - RVX - Miscellaneous - Spoof streaming data, and turn on 'Use JavaScript client'. 2. Go to Settings - RVX - Miscellaneous - Spoof streaming data, and change 'Default client' to 'TV'."
Listen with YouTube Music menu is shown.
Listen with YouTube Music menu is hidden.

Stats for nerds menu is hidden.

Watch in VR menu is hidden.

"Fullscreen button is hidden.
Limitation: All overlay buttons may be hidden after the video ends."
Explore the podcast section is shown.
Explore the podcast section is hidden.
Size of the comments section is changed, making it impossible to open live chat replay.
Size of the comments section is unchanged, making it possible to open live chat replay.
Open mix playlist button is shown.
Open mix playlist button is hidden.
More videos section in quick actions container and related videos overlay are shown.
More videos section in quick actions container and related videos overlay are hidden.

"This setting limits the maximum number of layouts that can be loaded on the player screen.
If some related videos are not hidden, or unintended layouts such as the action bar or comments section are hidden, changing the offset may resolve the issue.
If the layout of the player screen changes due to server-side changes, unintended layouts may be hidden on the player screen."
Thumbnails in search term history are shown.
Thumbnails in search term history are hidden.

Subscriptions section header is shown.\n\nThe Subscriptions section header includes \'Visit Community\' and \'Visit Channel\' buttons when clicking on a subscribed channel\’s icon in the Subscriptions section.

Subscriptions section header is hidden.\n\nThe Subscriptions section header includes \'Visit Community\' and \'Visit Channel\' buttons when clicking on a subscribed channel\’s icon in the Subscriptions section.

Info: • This setting seems to be deprecated on the server. • Use 'Hide filmstrip overlay' or 'Hide seek undo message' instead."

"Seek message is hidden.

Billing and payments menu is hidden.

Floating buttons in Shorts pages are hidden.
Live chat header is hidden.\n\nBack button in header will not be hidden.

Play & Pause button background is hidden.

Info: Only shelves with the Shorts header on the Home tab are hidden."

"Hidden in watch history.

"Home / Subscriptions / Search results are filtered to hide videos with views less or greater than a specified number.
Limitations: • Live streams or Shorts cannot be hidden. • Videos with 0 views are not filtered."
Videos in Home feed are not filtered.
Videos in Home feed are filtered.

Videos in Subscriptions feed are filtered.
Hide recommended videos with less than a specified number of views.\n\nKnown issue: Videos with 0 views are not filtered.
"Thumbnail labels - such as 'People also watched' and 'You might also like' - are hidden."
"Thumbnail labels - such as 'People also watched' and 'You might also like' - are hidden."
Videos with views greater than this number will be hidden.
Videos with views less than this number will be hidden.

Specify your language template for the number of views shown under each video in the user interface. Each key (a letter/word in your language) -> value (meaning of the key) must be on a new line. Keys go before "->" sign. If you change the app or system language you need to reset this setting.

Examples:
English: 10K views = K -> 1000, views -> views
Spanish: 10 K vistas = K -> 1000, vistas -> views
View products banner in video overlay is shown.
View products banner in video overlay is hidden.
You may like section is shown.
You may like section is hidden.

"YouTube Doodles show up a few days each year.
If a YouTube Doodle is currently showing in your region and this setting is on, the filter bar below the search bar will also be hidden."
Theme of the snack bar is not inverted.
Theme of the snack bar is inverted.
Keeps landscape mode when turning the screen off and on in fullscreen.
Videos play in portrait mode after turning the screen off and on.
Videos continue to play in landscape mode after turning the screen off and on.
The amount of milliseconds the landscape mode is forced after the screen in turned on.
Double-tap action and pinch to resize is disabled.

"Tap to copy video URL with timestamp. Tap and hold to copy video timestamp."

Seekbar thumbnails will appear in fullscreen.

Old player layout is not used.
"Old player layout is used. No margins on top and bottom of player."

"A YouTube Data API v3 Developer Key is required to replace handles with usernames.
The daily quota for API keys on the free plan is 10,000, and 1 quota is used to replace a handle with a username for 1 comment.
Click to see how to issue an API key."
The developer key for using the YouTube Data API v3.

1. Go to Create a new project.
2. Click the CREATE button.
3. Go to YouTube Data API v3.
4. Click the ENABLE button.
5. Click the CREATE CREDENTIALS button.
6. Select the Public data option.
7. Click the NEXT button.
8. Copy the API key.

※ API key should never be shared with others, so it is not included in Import / Export settings.
Issue YouTube Data API v3 developer key
Dislike data is provided by the Return YouTube Dislike API. Tap here to learn more.
Like button styled for best appearance.
Like button styled for minimum width.

Videos with disabled likes show an estimated likes count.

"Dislikes are shown on Shorts.
Limitation: Dislikes may not appear if the user is not logged in or in incognito mode."

Start must be before the end.
Tangential scenes or jokes that are not required to understand the main content of the video. Does not include sections providing context or background details.
The part of the video that most people are looking for.
Narrated trailers for the upcoming video, greetings and goodbyes. Does not include sections that add additional content.
A short reminder to like, subscribe, or follow them in the middle of content. If it is long or about something specific, it should instead be under self promotion.
An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, or repeating animation. Does not include transitions containing information.
Only for use in music videos. Sections of music videos without music, that aren\'t already covered by another category.
Credits or when the YouTube endcards appear. Not for conclusions with information.
Collection of clips that show what is coming up or what happened in the video or in other videos of a series, where all information is repeated elsewhere.
Similar to Sponsor, except for unpaid or self promotion. Includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with.
Paid promotion, paid referrals, and direct advertisements. Not for self-promotion or free shout-outs to causes / creators / websites / products they like.
Your SponsorBlock JSON configuration that can be imported / exported to RVX and other SponsorBlock platforms.
Your SponsorBlock JSON configuration that can be imported / exported to RVX and other SponsorBlock platforms. This includes your private user id. Be sure to share this wisely.

Your settings contain a private SponsorBlock userid.

Your user id is like a password, and it should never be shared.

Cookies are set only for auto-translated subtitle requests.
Cookies are set for all Transcript API requests.
Set Cookies for all Transcript API requests

"There is currently a bug on YouTube where auto-translated subtitles are unavailable.
This is an issue with the YouTube Transcript API, and Google needs to fix it.
As a temporary workaround, you can resolve this issue by setting Cookies.
[Disclaimer]
Using Cookies is not a silver bullet.
This may not work if: • Cookies have expired. • Invalid Cookies are being used. • YouTube Transcript API no longer validates Cookies."

"App version will be spoofed to an older version of YouTube.
This will change the appearance and features of the app, but unknown side effects may occur.
If later turned off, it is recommended to clear the app data to prevent UI bugs."

"Spoofs the device dimensions to the maximum value.
Info: • High quality may be unlocked on some videos that require high device dimensions, but not all videos. • This setting is not available if 'Spoof streaming data' is turned on."
Audio track button is not shown.
"Audio track button is shown when the client used to fetch streaming data is 'Android VR', 'Mobile Web', or 'visionOS'."

"Prerequisites: • The client used to fetch the streaming data is 'Android VR', 'Mobile Web', 'iPadOS', or 'visionOS'. • A video with multiple audio tracks is being played.
Known issues: • If the app language is changed in YouTube settings and the app is not restarted, the language used in audio track dialog may not change. • Sometimes the wrong language is selected in audio track dialog. • Some audio tracks, such as 'English descriptive', are not supported.
This feature is still in development, so it may break at any time due to server-side changes."
Could not fetch any client streams.
Try changing the default client to TV.
Video codec is forced to AVC (H.264).

"Enabling this might improve battery life and fix playback stuttering.
AVC has a maximum resolution of 1080p, Opus audio codec is not available, and video playback will use more internet data than VP9 or AV1."
If you experience any playback issues, enable \"Spoof streaming data\" in Settings > %s > Miscellaneous > Spoof streaming data.

"Some videos have the following video quality and codecs:
• 1080p AVC • 720p AVC • 360p VP9
If the device supports VP9, '1080p AVC' and '720p AVC' are ignored.
In other words, '360p VP9' is used as the highest video quality, and '1080p AVC' and '720p AVC' are not visible in the video quality flyout menu.
This is the intended behavior of the Android YouTube app, and this is why the video quality flyout menu was unavailable for some videos.
Although VP9 is a more advanced codec than AVC, some users may prefer '1080p AVC' over '360p VP9'.
If this setting is enabled, the highest available video quality from the server response is used, regardless of the video codec.
Example 1:
• 1080p AVC • 720p AVC • 360p VP9
→ 1080p AVC is used.
Example 2:
• 1080p AVC • 1080p VP9 • 720p VP9
→ 1080p VP9 is used."
Reload video button is shown when loading spinner showing.
Reload video button is always shown.
"• Audio track menu is missing. • Disable forced auto audio tracks is not available. • Stable volume is not available. • Kids videos may not play when logged out or in incognito mode."

"• Audio track menu is missing. • Disable forced auto audio tracks is not available. • Stable volume is not available. • Kids videos may not play when logged out or in incognito mode. • 1080p+, AV1, and HDR are not supported."
"• Audio track menu is missing. • Stable volume is not available."
"• Audio track menu is missing. • Stable volume is not available. • Kids videos may not play when logged out or in incognito mode."
• There may be playback issues (PoToken required).
"• Videos may end 1 second early. • OPUS audio codec may not be supported."
• Whole ASNs/IP ranges may be blocked by the server.

"• Audio track menu may be missing. • Disable forced auto audio tracks may not be available. • Stable volume is not available. • Movies or paid videos may not play. • Kids videos may not play when logged out or in incognito mode."
"• AV1 is not supported. • Video may stop at 1:00, or may not be available in some regions."

"• Audio track menu is missing. • If deobfuscation fails, playback may fail. • Sometimes the video will not play even after 10 seconds, in which case you'll need to click the reload video button. • Video may start late."
"• If deobfuscation fails, playback may fail. • Sometimes the video will not play even after 10 seconds, in which case you'll need to click the reload video button. • Video may start late."
"• Audio track menu is missing. • Kids videos may not play when logged out or in incognito mode. • Since this is an unreleased client, it may stop working at any time."

"Streaming data is not spoofed. Video playback may not work."

"Streaming data is spoofed.
If you are a YouTube Premium user, this setting may not be necessary."

"JavaScript client is not used for some videos that require fast playback:
• Autoplay in feed • Clips • Shorts"

"JavaScript client is used regardless of video type.
• JavaScript client still cannot play some videos."
Use JavaScript client for all videos

"One reason videos start too late in the JavaScript client is due to YouTube's new anti-adblock measures.
When a video ad is blocked, GVS (Google Video Server) generate fake buffering proportional to the ad duration (A/B testing).
uBlock Origin has found a workaround for this issue, which can be enabled via the 'Bypass fake buffering' setting.
Click 'Open' to read the article."

"Bypass fake buffering is enabled.
Limitations: • Due to server-side changes, this may stop working at any time."
JavaScript client not added to available clients.
JavaScript client added to the available clients.

"JavaScript clients may experience a slight delay in starting the video due to the requirement to decode the n-sig pattern.
Occasionally, the n-sig pattern fails to be decoded, causing the video to start late or the video stream to stutter.
This can be easily resolved by clicking the 'Reload video button' in the player to reload the video.
(Prerequisites: Both 'Show reload video button' and 'Always show reload video button' are enabled)
Among JavaScript clients, the recommended client is TV."

"JavaScript for deobfuscation is not kept up to date.
• JavaScript that succeeds in deobfuscation is used, but it is still somewhat server-dependent."

"JavaScript for deobfuscation is kept up to date.
• It is highly server-dependent, and the success or failure of deobfuscation depends on the JavaScript currently used on the server."

"Player JavaScript for deobfuscation is not kept up to date.
• Player JavaScript that succeeds in deobfuscation is used, but it is still somewhat server-dependent."

"Player JavaScript for deobfuscation is kept up to date.
• It is highly server-dependent, and the success or failure of deobfuscation depends on the Player JavaScript currently used on the server. • If you're having issues with JavaScript client, try disabling this first."
Turning off this setting may cause video playback issues.

The amount of pixels to swipe to change the brightness. Lower values make the brightness change faster, higher values make it slower (1-1000).

Save and restore brightness when exiting or entering fullscreen.
The amount of pixels to swipe to skip through video content. Lower values make seeking faster, higher values make it slower (1-1000).

"Fullscreen seek swipe is enabled.
Seek the video by swiping horizontally on the top half of the screen."
The amount of pixels to swipe to change the video speed. Lower values make the speed change faster, higher values make it slower (1-1000).

"Fullscreen speed swipe is enabled.
Adjust speed by swiping horizontally on the bottom half of the screen."

The text size for swipe overlay between 1-30.
The amount of threshold for swipe to occur.
The amount of pixels to swipe to adjust the volume. Lower values make the volume change faster, higher values make it slower (1-1000).

How much the volume changes per swipe.

"Swaps the positions of the Create button with the Notifications button by spoofing device information.
• The device may need to be rebooted for a change of this setting to take effect. • Disabling this setting loads more ads from the server side. • You should disable this setting to make video ads visible."

Package name of installed RVX Music.
Click to see how to get Cookies.

"Auth ══════════════ 1. Click 'Auth' to open the sign in page in WebView. 2. Sign in to your Google Account. 3. Plays any video that supports auto-translated subtitles. 4. Turn on auto-translated subtitles and see if it works. 4-1. If auto-translated subtitles don't work, switch to another video that supports auto-translated subtitles and try step 4 again. 5. Click the three dots on the toolbar to open the contextual menu. 6. Click 'Get Cookies'. 7. Click 'Copy' to copy the Cookies. 8. Close WebView and paste the copied Cookies into the 'Transcript Cookies' settings.
No Auth ══════════════ 1. Click 'No Auth' to open the video in WebView. 2. Play the video for at least 3 seconds. 3. Click the three dots on the toolbar to open the contextual menu. 4. Click 'Get Cookies'. 5. Click 'Copy' to copy the Cookies. 6. Close WebView and paste the copied Cookies into the 'Transcript Cookies' settings.
Disclaimer: Cookies issued without signing in may be invalid or may take time to become available to the Transcript API."
Cookies to use in Transcript API requests.
"• Follows the watch history settings of Google account. • Watch history may not work due to DNS or VPN."
• Follows the watch history settings of Google account.

"Yandex can transcribe videos from any language, but the output is available only in English (en), Russian (ru) and Kazakh (kk). If you enter any other language code or use 'app' (which stands for the app's default language), Gemini will be asked to translate (API key is required)."
Use Yandex transcription instead of Gemini. Yandex is faster and more reliable. No API key is required.
